column4: S Limestone between Scott St and Colfax St
column5: Both outbound lanes blocked due to water main repair.  Traffic diverted to the left turn lane until further notice.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
